regions.name: North Region
regions.description: Home to the Amazon Rainforest and unique biodiversity
regions.climate: Equatorial climate (hot and humid all year)

locations.name: Amazon Rainforest
locations.description: The world largest tropical rainforest spanning nine countries, home to 10% of Earth biodiversity
locations.culturalTip: Try açaí bowls from local street vendors

locations.name: Lençóis Maranhenses
locations.description: Unique desert landscape with crystal-clear freshwater lagoons between white sand dunes, appeared in the movie Avengers end game
locations.culturalTip: Visit during the rainy season for the best lagoon views

locations.name: Alter do Chão
locations.description: Picturesque river beach known as the Caribbean of the Amazon with white sands and calm waters
locations.culturalTip: Do not miss the Sairé Festival in September

regions.name: Northeast Region
regions.description: Known for stunning beaches and rich cultural heritage

locations.name: Porto de Galinhas
locations.description: World-famous beach with natural pools formed by coral reefs, ideal for snorkeling
locations.culturalTip: Try the local seafood dishes at beachside restaurants

locations.name: Salvador Historic Center
locations.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site with colorful colonial architecture and Afro-Brazilian culture

locations.name: Jericoacoara
locations.description: Protected national park with stunning dunes, lagoons, and one of the best sunsets in Brazil
locations.culturalTip: Watch the sunset at the famous Duna do Pôr do Sol

regions.name: Central-West Region
regions.description: Heart of Brazil with vast plains and wetlands

locations.name: Pantanal Wetlands
locations.description: largest tropical wetland area in the world, home to jaguars, caimans, and hundreds of bird species
locations.culturalTip: Take a guided wildlife safari to spot jaguars

locations.name: Chapada dos Veadeiros
locations.description: Highland national park with quartz crystal landscapes, waterfalls, and hiking trails
locations.culturalTip: Visit during the dry season for the best hiking conditions

locations.name: Bonito
locations.description: Ecotourism capital famous for crystal-clear rivers, caves, and abundant aquatic life
locations.culturalTip: Snorkel in the crystal-clear rivers for an unforgettable experience

regions.name: Southeast Region
regions.description: Economic hub with vibrant cities and mountain ranges

locations.name: Rio de Janeiro
locations.description: Iconic city famous for Christ the Redeemer statue, Copacabana beach, and Carnival festival
locations.culturalTip: Visit during Carnival for the ultimate cultural experience

locations.name: São Paulo City
locations.description: Largest city in South America with world-class museums, restaurants, and cultural diversity
locations.culturalTip: Explore the diverse culinary scene in Liberdade district

locations.name: Paraty
locations.description: Colonial-era town with cobblestone streets, preserved architecture, and tropical islands
locations.culturalTip: Take a boat tour to explore the nearby islands

regions.name: South Region
regions.description: European influence and cool climate destinations

locations.name: Gramado
locations.description: Charming alpine-style town known for chocolate shops, Christmas lights, and German architecture
locations.culturalTip: Visit during winter for the famous Natal Luz festival

locations.name: Iguazu Falls
locations.description: Largest waterfall system in the world spanning Brazil and Argentina, surrounded by rainforest
locations.culturalTip: Take a helicopter ride for a breathtaking view of the falls

locations.name: Florianópolis
locations.description: Island capital with 42 beaches, lagoons, and a mix of modern infrastructure and nature
locations.culturalTip: Try the local seafood at Mercado Público
